name: Crypto Kingdom
desc: Website to help you keep track of the latests updates in the crypto market, uses the free CoinGecko API to get the most recent data available.

name: Weather Report App
desc: Easy to use web app to get the current weather of any city in the world. Powered by the OpenWeather API, it displays the different values of temperature, wind speed, etc. Available in celsius or farenheit and in metric or imperial system.

name: PokéDex
desc: Web app that displays the basic info about the first 151 Pokemon from the Kanto region, displaying their types, abilities, names, Dex number and sprites. Powered by PokéAPI
